author: Leonardo da Vinci
message: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Denis Waitley
message: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler.
title: Thought of the day

author: Jim Rohn
message: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lena Horne
message: Always be smarter than the people who hire you.
title: Thought of the day
